Home.environment_2: in the palm of your hand
Home.environment_subtitle: Our technology connects owners, veterinarians, pet shops and professionals in a pet care network, centralizing the animal's life history in a single place.
Home.technology_welfare_subtitle: all the features designed for those who give us care and love on a daily basis.
Home.pet_id_description: With our biometric technology via snout, PET ID identifies your pet instantly, centralizes vital data and medical history, optimizing safety and care.
Home.connected_history_description: All health history of your pet(s), such as: consultations, reports, measurements, treatments in one place. No more folders, papers, and pdf files.
Home.more_than_app_description: We are the most efficient and integrated way to manage pet health and well-being, with easy access to services, products, locations, pet professionals, and more. Convenience for everyone who loves their pets.
Home.continuous_innovation_description: Through technology, we empower everyone involved in the pet journey, from veterinarians to service providers.
Home.explore_ecosystem_subtitle: Discover how our ecosystem revolutionizes pet care, integrating all aspects of your pet's life in one place.
Home.total_care_subtitle: Unique features that make it easy to manage your pet's health and well-being, from vaccination reminders to specialized professionals near you.
Home.insights_life_change_subtitle: Miau Club can expand your business, connecting you to a wide network of pet owners and providing valuable data and insights to improve your services.
Home.revolutionize_care: the app that will revolutionize pet health and well-being care

Tutors.everything_pet: Everything for your pet in the palm of your hand
Tutors.practicality_health: More practicality for the tutor and the animal: health and well-being managed without complications, supported by Pet ID's unique innovation, which facilitates complete and secure monitoring.
Tutors.direct_connection: Direct and uninterrupted connection with veterinarians, clinics, and hospitals. All your pet's information available without the need for complicated downloads or uploads.
Tutors.ai_adapts: Our artificial intelligence adapts and learns with each interaction, making caring for your pet increasingly smarter and more precise.
Tutors.personalized_suggestions: Receive tailor-made suggestions, designed exclusively to meet the unique needs of your pet.
Tutors.farewell_paperwork_text: We've made the journey for everyone involved in pet care and well-being simpler.
Tutors.direct_connections_text: We've made the journey for everyone involved in pet care and well-being simpler.
Tutors.convenience_text: We connect tutors to a wide range of pet services, ensuring comfort and convenience.
Tutors.free_platform_text: Free access to essential resources for your pet's daily care.
Tutors.feedback_support_text: Support for your pet's care, ensuring that every decision is informed and focused on the animal's well-being.
Tutors.pet_adoption_text: We support and believe in this cause. Even if you already have your pet, you can help the thousands of pets find a home.
Tutors.total_care_description: With the MiAu Club app, you have all your pet's information centralized in one place! From consultations to vaccines, exams, and medical prescriptions.
Tutors.tutor_easy_life_description: Forget the confusion of multiple apps. In MiAu Club, you manage your pet's health and well-being, as well as access essential services and products, all in one place!
Tutors.pet_id_obligation_title: Pet ID, a Commitment to Your Animal's Life
Tutors.pet_id_obligation_description: Our biometric recognition technology ensures immediate identification of your pet. PET ID centralizes vital data and medical history, simplifying veterinary consultations and increasing security in emergencies.
Tutors.life_tech_title: Technology at the Service of Life
Tutors.life_tech_description: Technology at the service of life. MiAu Club's artificial intelligence works to understand and predict your pet's needs, offering recommendations that make a difference in everyday life.

Partners.welcome_pet_tech_title: Build Pet-techs and PET data services, in real-time. Fast.
Partners.welcome_pet_tech_description: Set up, integrate, use. A range of services built and tailored for pets.

Partners.personalized_ai_subtitle: Your pet's entire history safe and accessible with a single touch connected to a unique ecosystem.
Partners.data_security_subtitle: Confidentiality and data integrity are the backbone of our ecosystem, end-to-end, fully encrypted.
Partners.scalable_solutions_subtitle: We support and believe in this cause. Even if you already have your pet, you can help thousands of pets find a home.
